RT @marcorubio My office working with local governments in impacted area to set up centers for victims to apply for @fema grants for basic repairs to make your home safe,sanitary & secure & for temporary help with housing for you & your family to stay while you build your recovery plan #Sayfie

RT @marcorubio If you cannot live in your home because of disaster damage visit http://DisasterAssistance.gov, or call 800-621-3362 (800-462-7585 TTY) (multilingual operators are available) to learn if state,voluntary & local organizations are in your area can address your immediate needs. #Sayfie

RT @marcorubio SBA Loans also can be used by homeowners & renters up to $40K to repair or replace disaster damaged or destroyed personal property. Interest rates are as low as 3.675 % for businesses,2.5% for nonprofits & 2%. Terms for homeowners & renters up to 30 years. #Sayfie

RT @marcorubio Small Business Administration has made disaster declaration for Bay,Franklin,Gulf,Taylor & Wakulla counties. Now eligible for both Physical & Economic Injury Disaster Loans. Loans up to $200K available to homeowners to repair or replace damaged or destroyed real estate. #Sayfie

RT @marcorubio Worked with IRS to extend Monday’s tax deadline for storm victims. Now have until Feb. 28,2019 to file certain individual &business tax returns & make certain payments if live in one of eligible localities listed on disaster relief page on http://IRS.gov #Sayfie
RT @marcorubio Here is an afternoon update on the federal response to #HurricaneMichael in the thread below: #Sayfie

.@EPA has identified priority oil & chemical facilities & other sites that might require assessment in order to prevent hazardous waste/material damage. #Sayfie

.@FCC is prepared to provide emergency assistance to communications providers & has created dedicated webpage for information about #HurricaneMichael, including tips for communicating during an emergency. #Sayfie

@USACEHQ deployed 2 temporary roofing subject matter experts to assess the need for temporary roofing & deployed 249th Engineer Battalion which is ready to install generators as requested by state;55 generators are onsite with an additional 30 generators en route.  #Sayfie
.@USCG has completed 488 rescues/assistance missions and one animal rescue. #Sayfie

.@fema has already been contacted by over 11,500 looking for assistance. They are continuing to provide support for crisis action efforts including @HHSGov mobile strike teams conducting urban search & rescue missions. They have provide the state over 700k meals. #Sayfie

.@NOAA is continuing to take & provide valuable aerial surveys for damage assessment. As of this morning they have surveyed over 2k square kilometers & collected over 3k image frames. Another flight today will focus on damage in northern #Florida #Sayfie
Below on this thread is the latest update on the Federal response to #HurricaneMichael. #Sayfie :

An absolutely shameful attempt at voter suppression. Spread the word to voters in Georgia: if you or someone you know has a “pending” status, you can still vote if you bring your ID that matches the registration application. 
https://twitter.com/voxdotcom/status/1050812094554284032 QT @voxdotcom Republican Georgia Sec. of State Brian Kemp is running for governor, and he's also in charge of the state's voting systems.  

Now, civil rights groups charge he's attempting to suppress the black vote just weeks before Election Day. https://www.vox.com/policy-and-politics/2018/10/11/17964104/georgia-voter-registration-suppression-purges-stacey-abrams-brian-kemp?utm_campaign=vox.social&utm_medium=social&utm_source=sprout&utm_content=1539362437
